p: To compare the macroscopic characteristics, physicochemical parameters and antioxidant activity among the samples of P. matricarioides collected in different localities, an analysis of variance was carried out, followed by the Dunnett or Tukey test. To antioxidant activity, data were analyzed by ANOVA test, followed by Duncan test. The analysis were carried out through the Statgraphics Â®Plus program, version 5.0, considering statistical differences as p < 0.05.
